comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: May 11, 1914: National Memorial Service for the 17 Navy sailors killed at Vera Cruz in April. New York Times story, 5/11/14: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=940CE3DB173AE6...

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Wystan,

Thanks for your efforts with the numerous photographs which document the National Memorial Service of May 11, 1914. We will be able to better link the related images and expand the descriptions, including the addition of a date where one is not yet included. Here we will also add the full names and titles of Secretary Daniels and Governor Glynn.
